Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.name: file
Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.abstract: The file to be attached, encoded using multipart form data. The file must have a MIME

Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.name: thumbnail
Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.abstract: The custom thumbnail of the media to be attached, encoded using multipart form data.

Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.name: description
Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.abstract: A plain-text description of the media, for accessibility purposes.

Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.name: focus
Structs/UploadMediaAttachmentParams.html.abstract: Two floating points (x,y), comma-delimited, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: privacy
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: The default post privacy to be used for new posts.

Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: sensitive
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: Whether new posts should be marked sensitive by default.

Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: language
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: The default posting language for new posts.

Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.name: poll
Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.abstract: A poll you have voted in or created has ended

Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.name: post
Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.abstract: Someone you enabled notifications for has posted a post

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: id
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The id of the notification in the database.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: type
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The type of event that resulted in the notification.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: account
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: post
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Post that was the object of the notification, e.g. in mentions, reposts, favourites, or polls.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: name
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: The key of a given field’s key-value pair.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: value
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: The value associated with the name key.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: verifiedAt
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: Timestamp of when the server verified a URL value for a rel=“me” link.

Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.name: wrappedValue
Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.abstract: The content value received from the server where special content like emoji :codes codes have been replaced with HTML tags

Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.name: string
Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.abstract: A plain text string generated by stripping all HTML formatting. This form excludes images and other content which can’t be represented as plain text.

Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.name: attributedString
Structs/TootContent.html#/s:7TootSDK0A7C.abstract: An instance of NSAttributedString created by parsing the HTML string and accounting for fediverse specific content like :emojis, tags, mentiones and others. Use the NSAttributedString.string field to access a plain-text representation which includes emoji codes. Images are not included in this representation.

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: vapidKey
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Used for Push Streaming API. Returned with POST /api/v1/apps. Equivalent to PushSubscription#server_key

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: clientId
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Client ID key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: clientSecret
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Client secret key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: day
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: uses
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: the counted usage of the tag within that day.

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: accounts
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: the total of accounts using the tag within that day.

Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV4nameSS.name: name
Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV4nameSS.abstract: The value of the hashtag after the # sign.

Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV3urlSSv.name: url
Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV3urlSSv.abstract: A link to the hashtag on the instance.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: init(text:mediaIds:sensitive:spoilerText:visibility:language:scheduledAt:poll:idempotency:inReplyToId:contentType:inReplyToConversationId:)
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Creates parameters to create a new scheduled post

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: text
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: The text content of the post. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while post is provided.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: mediaIds
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, post becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: sensitive
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Postes are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: spoilerText
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Mark post and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: visibility
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Sets the visibility of the posted post to public, unlisted, private, direct.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: scheduledAt
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: UTC Datetime at which to schedule a post.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: inReplyToId
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: ID of the post being replied to, if post is a reply.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: contentType
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: (Pleroma) The MIME type of the post, it is transformed into HTML by the backend. You can get the list of the supported MIME types with the nodeinfo endpoint.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.name: inReplyToConversationId
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: (Pleroma) Will reply to a given conversation, addressing only the people who are part of the recipient set of that conversation. Sets the visibility to direct.

Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: id
Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: ID of the scheduled post in the database.

Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: scheduledAt
Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: ID of the post in the database.

Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: params
Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The parameters to be used when the post is posted

Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: mediaAttachments
Structs/ScheduledPost.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: Media that is attached to this post.

Structs/RemoveAccountsFromListParams.htm.name: accountIds
Structs/RemoveAccountsFromListParams.htm.abstract: The accounts that should be added to the list.

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: requested
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Do you have a pending follow request for this user?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: endorsed
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you featuring this user on your profile?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: mutingNotifications
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you muting notifications from this user?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: showingReposts
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you receiving this user’s posts in your home timeline?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: notifying
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Have you enabled notifications for this user?

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: id
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The id of the push subscription in the database.

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: endpoint
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Where push alerts will be sent to.

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: alerts
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Which alerts should be delivered to the endpoint.

Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.name: showAll
Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.abstract: Always show all media by default, regardless of sensitivity

Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.name: hideAll
Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.abstract: Always hide all media by default, regardless of sensitivity

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultVisibility
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default visibility for new posts. Equivalent to Source#privacy.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultSensitive
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default sensitivity flag for new posts. Equivalent to Source#sensitive.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultLanguage
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default language for new posts. Equivalent to Source#language

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: readingExpandMedia
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Whether media attachments should be automatically displayed or blurred/hidden.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: readingExpandSpoilers
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Whether CWs should be expanded by default.

Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: id
Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: ID of the status in the database.

Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: text
Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: The plain text used to compose the status.

Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: spoilerText
Structs/PostSource.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: The plain text used to compose the status’s subject or content warning.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: init(post:mediaIds:poll:inReplyToId:sensitive:spoilerText:visibility:language:contentType:inReplyToConversationId:)
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: Creates an object to create a new post with

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: post
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: The text content of the post. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while post is provided.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: mediaIds
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, post becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: inReplyToId
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: ID of the post being replied to, if post is a reply.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: sensitive
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: Mark post and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: spoilerText
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Posts are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: visibility
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: Sets the visibility of the posted post to public, unlisted, private, direct.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: contentType
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: (Pleroma) The MIME type of the post, it is transformed into HTML by the backend. You can get the list of the supported MIME types with the nodeinfo endpoint.

Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.name: inReplyToConversationId
Structs/PostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK10Pos.abstract: (Pleroma) Will reply to a given conversation, addressing only the people who are part of the recipient set of that conversation. Sets the visibility to direct.

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: content
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: The content of the pos] at this revision.

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: spoilerText
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: The content of the subject or content warning at this revision

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: sensitive
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: Whether the post was marked sensitive at this revision

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: createdAt
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: The timestamp of when the revision was published

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: poll
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: The current state of the poll options at this revision

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: mediaAttachments
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: The current state of the media attachments at this revision

Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.name: emojis
Structs/PostEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK8PostEd.abstract: Any custom emoji that are used in the current revision

Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.name: title
Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.abstract: The text value of the poll option. String.

Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.name: votesCount
Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.abstract: The number of received votes for this option. Number, or null if results are not published yet.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV2idSS.name: id
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV2idSS.abstract: The ID of the poll in the database.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV11vot.name: votersCount
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV11vot.abstract: How many unique accounts have voted on a multiple-choice poll.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV5vote.name: voted
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV5vote.abstract: When called with a user token, has the authorized user voted?

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV8ownV.name: ownVotes
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV8ownV.abstract: When called with a user token, which options has the authorized user chosen?

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV6emoj.name: emojis
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV6emoj.abstract: Custom emoji to be used for rendering poll options.

Structs/PleromaOauthApp.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: redirectUri
Structs/PleromaOauthApp.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Where the user is to be redirected after authorization. A value of urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob means the user will be given an authorization code instead of a redirect.

Structs/PleromaOauthApp.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: website
Structs/PleromaOauthApp.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: A URL to the homepage of the app

Structs/ListOauthAppsParams.html#/s:7Too.name: pageSize
Structs/ListOauthAppsParams.html#/s:7Too.abstract: Number of apps to return, defaults to 50.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: id
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The account id of the mentioned user.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: url
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The location of the mentioned user’s profile.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: acct
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The webfinger acct: URI of the mentioned user.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: id
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: The ID of the attachment in the database.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: url
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: The location of the original full-size attachment.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: remoteUrl
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: The location of the full-size original attachment on the remote website.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: previewUrl
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: The location of a scaled-down preview of the attachment.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: meta
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Metadata returned by Paperclip, only original, small and focus are serialized.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: description
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Alternate text that describes what is in the media attachment, to be used for the visually impaired or when media attachments do not load.

Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: blurhash
Structs/MediaAttachment.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: A hash computed by the BlurHash algorithm, for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.

Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: home
Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Information about the user’s position in the home timeline.

Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: notifications
Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Information about the user’s position in their notifications.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV1.name: lastReadId
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV1.abstract: The ID of the most recently viewed entity.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV9.name: updatedAt
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV9.abstract: The timestamp of when the marker was set.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV7.name: version
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV7.abstract: Used for locking to prevent write conflicts.

Structs/List.html#/s:7TootSDK4ListV2idSS.name: id
Structs/List.html#/s:7TootSDK4ListV2idSS.abstract: The internal database ID of the list.

Structs/Instance/Stats.html#/s:7TootSDK8.name: postCount
Structs/Instance/Stats.html#/s:7TootSDK8.abstract: Posts authored by users on instance. Number.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: shortDescription
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: A shorter description defined by the admin.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: email
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: An email that may be contacted for any inquiries.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: version
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: The version of the server installed on the instance.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: languages
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: Primary languages of the website and its staff.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: stats
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: Statistics about how much information the instance contains.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: contactAccount
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: A user that can be contacted, as an alternative to email.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: providerUsername
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The account owner’s username on the identity provider’s service.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: profileUrl
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The account owner’s profile URL on the identity provider.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: proofUrl
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: A link to a statement of identity proof, hosted by the identity provider.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: updatedAt
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: When the identity proof was last updated.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV3ur.name: url
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV3ur.abstract: A link to a static copy of the custom emoji.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV15v.name: visibleInPicker
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV15v.abstract: Whether this Emoji should be visible in the picker or unlisted.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV8ca.name: category
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV8ca.abstract: Used for sorting custom emoji in the picker.

Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.name: post
Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.abstract: The text content of the post. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while post is provided.

Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.name: spoilerText
Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Posts are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.name: sensitive
Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.abstract: Mark post and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.name: mediaIds
Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, post becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.name: poll
Structs/EditPostParams.html#/s:7TootSDK1.abstract: Poll options. Note that editing a poll’s options will reset the votes.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: id
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: The ID of the DomainBlock in the database.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: domain
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: The domain that is not allowed to federate.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: createdAt
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: When the domain was blocked from federating.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: severity
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: The policy to be applied by this domain block.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: rejectMedia
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: Whether to reject media attachments from this domain

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: rejectReports
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: Whether to reject reports from this domain

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: privateComment
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: A private note about this domain block, visible only to admins.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: publicComment
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: public note about this domain block, optionally shown on the about page.

Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.name: obfuscate
Structs/DomainBlock.html#/s:7TootSDK11Do.abstract: Whether to partially censor the domain when shown in public. Defaults to false

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: expiresIn
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Integer. Duration that the poll should be open, in seconds. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[options] must be provided.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: multiple
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Does the poll allow multiple-choice answers? Defaults to false.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: hideTotals
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Hide vote counts until the poll ends? Defaults to false.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: options
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Possible answers for the poll. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[expires_in] must be provided.

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: severity
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Whether to apply a silence, suspend, or noop to the domain. Defaults to silence

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: rejectMedia
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Whether media attachments should be rejected. Defaults to false

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: rejectReports
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Whether reports from this domain should be rejected. Defaults to false

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: privateComment
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: A private note about this domain block, visible only to admins.

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: publicComment
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: A public note about this domain block, optionally shown on the about page.

Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.name: obfuscate
Structs/BlockDomainParams.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Whether to partially censor the domain when shown in public. Defaults to false

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: id
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: The ID of the attachment in the database.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: url
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: The location of the original full-size attachment.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: remoteUrl
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: The location of the full-size original attachment on the remote website.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: previewUrl
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: The location of a scaled-down preview of the attachment.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: meta
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: Metadata returned by Paperclip, only original, small and focus are serialized.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: description
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: Alternate text that describes what is in the media attachment, to be used for the visually impaired or when media attachments do not load.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.name: blurhash
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:7TootSDK10Att.abstract: A hash computed by the BlurHash algorithm, for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: name
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: The emoji used for the reaction. Either a unicode emoji, or a custom emoji’s shortcode.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: count
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: The total number of users who have added this reaction.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: me
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: Whether the authorized user has added this reaction to the announcement.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: staticUrl
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: A link to a non-animated version of the custom emoji.

Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.name: createdAt
Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.abstract: Whether the announcement has a start/end time.

Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.name: read
Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.abstract: Whether the announcement has been read by the user.

Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV6.name: follow
Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV6.abstract: Receive a push notification when someone has followed you? Boolean.

Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV9.name: favourite
Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV9.abstract: Receive a push notification when a post you created has been favourited by someone else? Boolean.

Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV6.name: repost
Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV6.abstract: Receive a push notification when a post you created has been boosted by someone else? Boolean.

Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV7.name: mention
Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV7.abstract: Receive a push notification when someone else has mentioned you in a post? Boolean.

Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV4.name: poll
Structs/Alerts.html#/s:7TootSDK6AlertsV4.abstract: Receive a push notification when a poll you voted in or created has ended? Boolean. Added in 2.8.0

Structs/AddAccountsToListParams.html#/s:.name: accountIds
Structs/AddAccountsToListParams.html#/s:.abstract: The accounts that should be added to the list.

Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: username
Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The username of the account, not including domain.

Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: acct
Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to username for local users, or username@domain for remote users.

Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: locked
Structs/AccountLookup.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: Whether the account manually approves follow requests

Structs/TootHTML.html#/s:7TootSDK0A4HTML.name: extractAsPlainText(html:)
Structs/TootHTML.html#/s:7TootSDK0A4HTML.abstract: Remove all HTML tags, quick and dirty.

Structs/Activity.html.name: Activity
Structs/Activity.html.abstract: Represents a weekly bucket of instance activity.

Structs/Announcement.html.name: Announcement
Structs/Announcement.html.abstract: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html.name: AnnouncementReaction
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html.abstract: Represents an emoji reaction to an Announcement.

Structs/CreatePoll.html.name: CreatePoll
Structs/CreatePoll.html.abstract: A request to create a new poll

Structs/List.html.name: List
Structs/List.html.abstract: Represents a list of some users that the authenticated user follows.

Structs/ListParams.html.name: ListParams
Structs/ListParams.html.abstract: Params to change a list of users

Structs/Marker.html.name: Marker
Structs/Marker.html.abstract: Represents the last read position within a user’s timelines.

Structs/Mention.html.name: Mention
Structs/Mention.html.abstract: Represents a mention of a user within the content of a post.

Structs/ListOauthAppsParams.html.name: ListOauthAppsParams
Structs/ListOauthAppsParams.html.abstract: Parameters to retrieve a list of oauth apps

Structs/Poll.html.name: Poll
Structs/Poll.html.abstract: Represents a poll attached to a post.

Structs/PostSource.html.name: PostSource
Structs/PostSource.html.abstract: Represents a status’s source as plain text.

Structs/PushSubscription.html.name: PushSubscription
Structs/PushSubscription.html.abstract: Represents a subscription to the push streaming server.

Structs/Report.html.name: Report
Structs/Report.html.abstract: Reports filed against users and/or posts, to be taken action on by moderators.

Structs/ScheduledPost.html.name: ScheduledPost
Structs/ScheduledPost.html.abstract: Represents a post that will be published at a future scheduled date.

Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html.name: ScheduledPostParams
Structs/ScheduledPostParams.html.abstract: Parameters to post a new scheduled post

Structs/Tag.html.name: Tag
Structs/Tag.html.abstract: Represents a hashtag used within the content of a post.

Structs/TagHistory.html.name: TagHistory
Structs/TagHistory.html.abstract: Represents daily usage history of a hashtag.

Structs/TootApplication.html.name: TootApplication
Structs/TootApplication.html.abstract: Represents an application that interfaces with the REST API to access accounts or posts.

Structs/TootField.html.name: TootField
Structs/TootField.html.abstract: Represents a profile field as a name-value pair with optional verification.

Structs/TootNotification.html.name: TootNotification
Structs/TootNotification.html.abstract: Represents a notification of an event relevant to the user.

Structs/TootSource.html.name: TootSource
Structs/TootSource.html.abstract: Represents display or publishing preferences of user’s own account. Returned as an additional entity when verifying and updated credentials, as an attribute of Account.

Protocols/TootStream.html.name: TootStream
Protocols/TootStream.html.abstract: A protocol that all stream types can adopt

Enums/PostTootStreams.html#/s:7TootSDK04.name: timeLineHome
Enums/PostTootStreams.html#/s:7TootSDK04.abstract: A stream of the user’s home timeline

Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.name: unsupportedFlavour(current:required:)
Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.abstract: The requested operation is not supported by the current server flavour.

Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.name: clientAuthorizationFailed
Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.abstract: The remote instance did not respond with the expected payload during authorization

Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.name: internalError(_:)
Enums/TootSDKError.html#/s:7TootSDK0A8SD.abstract: A “this should never happen” asssertion has failed

Enums/ListRepliesPolicy.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: list
Enums/ListRepliesPolicy.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Show replies to members of the list

Enums/DomainBlockSeverity.html.name: DomainBlockSeverity
Enums/DomainBlockSeverity.html.abstract: The policy to be applied by this domain block.

Enums/PostTootStreams.html.name: PostTootStreams
Enums/PostTootStreams.html.abstract: A list of stream types which return [Post]

Enums/AccountTootStreams.html.name: AccountTootStreams
Enums/AccountTootStreams.html.abstract: A list of stream types which return Account

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: instanceURL
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: The URL of the instance we’re connected to

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: currentApplicationInfo
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: The application info retreived from the instance

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugRequests
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Set this to true to see a print() of outgoing requests.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugResponses
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Set this to true to see a print() of request response.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: flavour
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: The preferred fediverse server flavour to use for API calls

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: scopes
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: The authorization scopes the client was initialized with

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: data
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Data streams that the client can subscribe to

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: clientName
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: The clientName the client was initialized with

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: init(clientName:session:instanceURL:accessToken:scopes:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Initialization

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugOn()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Prints extra debug details like outgoing requests and responses

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugOff()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Stops printing debug details

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: verifyCredentials()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: A test to make sure that the user token works, and retrieves the account information

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getAccount(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: View information about a profile.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminGetDomainBlocks()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Show information about all blocked domains.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminGetDomainBlock(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Show information about a single blocked domain.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminBlockDomain(params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Blocks a domain on the current instance.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminUnblockDomain(domain:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Lift a block against a domain.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: userGetDomainBlocks(_:limit:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: View domains the user has blocked.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: userBlockDomain(domain:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Blocks a domain on the current instance.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: userUnblockDomain(domain:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Remove a domain block, if it exists in the user’s array of blocked domains.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getLists()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Fetch all lists that the user owns.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getList(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Fetch the list with the given ID. Used for verifying the title of a list, and which replies to show within that list.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: createList(params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Create a new list.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: createList(id:params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Change the title of a list, or which replies to show.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Delete a list

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getListAccounts(id:_:limit:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: View accounts in a list

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: addAccountsToList(id:params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Add accounts to a list

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: removeAccountsFromAList(id:params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Add accounts to a list

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Uploads a media to the server so it can be used when publishing posts

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getMedia(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Get a media attachment, before it is attached to a status and posted, but after it is accepted for processing.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminGetOauthApps(_:params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Retrieve a list of OAuth applications

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: adminDeleteOauthApp(appId:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Delete OAuth application

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Publishes the post based on the components provided

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Edit a given post to change its text, sensitivity, media attachments, or poll. Note that editing a poll’s options will reset the votes.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getPost(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Gets a single post

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getContext(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: deletePost(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Deletes a single post

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Obtain the source properties for a status so that it can be edited.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: followAccount(by:params:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Follow the given account. Can also be used to update whether to show reposts or enable notifications.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: followAccountURI(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Follow the given account; can be be the account name on the instance you’re on, or the user’s URI

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: lookupAccount(uri:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Mastodon Specific. Looks up an account based on it’s account name or URI, and returns a payload that containts the instance’s account id

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: unfollowAccount(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Unfollow the given account.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: removeAccountFromFollowers(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Remove the given account from your followers.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: blockAccount(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Block the given account. Clients should filter posts from this account if received (e.g. due to a boost in the Home timeline)

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: unblockAccount(by:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Unblock the given account

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: muteAccount(by:params:)

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Unmute the given account.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Find out whether a given account is followed, blocked, muted, etc.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Gets scheduled posts

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Gets a single Scheduled post by id

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: deleteScheduledPost(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Deletes a single scheduled post

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Provides the URL for authorizing, with a custom server URL.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Facility method to complete authentication by processing the response from the authorization step.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Exchange the callback authorization code for an accessToken.

Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: public
Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Visible to everyone, shown in public timelines.

Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: unlisted
Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Visible to public, but not included in public timelines.

Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: private
Classes/Post/Visibility.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Visible to followers only, and to any mentioned users.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC2idSS.name: id
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC2idSS.abstract: ID of the post in the database.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC3uriS.name: uri
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC3uriS.abstract: URI of the post used for federation.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC9crea.name: createdAt
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC9crea.abstract: The date when this post was created.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC9sens.name: sensitive
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC9sens.abstract: Is this post marked as sensitive content?

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC11spo.name: spoilerText
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC11spo.abstract: Subject or summary line, below which post content is collapsed until expanded.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC16med.name: mediaAttachments
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC16med.abstract: Media that is attached to this post.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC11app.name: application
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC11app.abstract: The application used to post this post.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC8ment.name: mentions
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC8ment.abstract: Mentions of users within the post content.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC6emoj.name: emojis
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC6emoj.abstract: Custom emoji to be used when rendering post content.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC12rep.name: repostsCount
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC12rep.abstract: How many reposts this post has received.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC15fav.name: favouritesCount
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC15fav.abstract: How many favourites this post has received.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC12rep.name: repliesCount
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC12rep.abstract: How many replies this post has received.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC3urlS.name: url
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC3urlS.abstract: A link to the post’s HTML representation.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC18inR.name: inReplyToAccountId
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC18inR.abstract: ID of the account being replied to.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC4card.name: card
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC4card.abstract: Preview card for links included within post content.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC4text.name: text
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC4text.abstract: Plain-text source of a post. Returned instead of content when post is deleted so the user

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC5mute.name: muted
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC5mute.abstract: Have you muted notifications for this post’s conversation?

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC6pinn.name: pinned
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC6pinn.abstract: Have you pinned this post? Only appears if the post is pinnable.

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC07dis.name: displayPost
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC07dis.abstract: Convenience var for which post to display. This can be used by clients instead of if/then checking the repost value itself

Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC16dis.name: displayingRepost
Classes/Post.html#/s:7TootSDK4PostC16dis.abstract: Indicates whether displayPost is a repost or not

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: init(id:username:acct:url:displayName:note:avatar:avatarStatic:header:headerStatic:locked:emojis:discoverable:createdAt:lastPostAt:postsCount:followersCount:followingCount:moved:suspended:limited:fields:bot:source:)
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: id
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The account id.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: username
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The username of the account, not including domain.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: acct
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to username for local users, or username@domain for remote users.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: url
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The location of the user’s profile page

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: displayName
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The profile’s display name.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: note
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The profile’s bio / description

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: avatar
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An image icon that is shown next to posts and in the profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: avatarStatic
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A static version of the avatar.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: header
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: headerStatic
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A static version of the header

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: locked
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Whether the account manually approves follow requests

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: emojis
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile. If none, an empty array will be returned

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: discoverable
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: createdAt
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: When the account was created

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: lastPostAt
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: When the most recent post was posted

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: postsCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: How many posts are attached to this account

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: followersCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The reported followers of this profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: followingCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The reported follows of this profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: moved
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: suspended
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: limited
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behing a warning screen.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: fields
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: bot
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A presentational flag.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: source
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra entity to be used with API methods to verify credentials and update credentials

Classes/UniversalRenderer.html.name: UniversalRenderer
Classes/UniversalRenderer.html.abstract: A simple renderer to adapt HTML content including custom emojis or render them as plain text

Classes/Account.html.name: Account
Classes/Account.html.abstract: Represents a user and their associated profile.

Classes/Post.html.name: Post
Classes/Post.html.abstract: Represents a post posted by an account.

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Initialises a TootStream with a given client, it is assumed the client is authorized already

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Reloads data in all currently active streams

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.name: refresh(_:)
Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Reloads data in the selected stream for post toot straems

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.name: refresh(_:)
Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Reloads data in the selected stream for account toot streams

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.name: stream(_:_:)
Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Provides an async stream of updates for the given stream

Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.name: stream(_:)
Actors/TootDataStream.html#/s:7TootSDK0A.abstract: Provides an async stream of updates for the given stream

Actors/TootDataStream.html.name: TootDataStream
Actors/TootDataStream.html.abstract: Provides a holder that returns streams of AsyncSequence data that can be refreshed, posts, account data etc
